title: Mini-Ep 81: Breakups and Breakouts with Lauren Morrill
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 81: Breakups and Breakouts with Lauren Morrill
itunes:subtitle: Kate, Doree, and YA author Lauren Morrill receive some listener feedback regarding self-care for new moms, get several messages about how to break up with your stylist, discuss sustainable toilet paper and clothing swaps, and lend advice to a teacher w...
description:
Kate, Doree, and YA author Lauren Morrill receive some listener feedback regarding self-care for new moms, get several messages about how to break up with your stylist, discuss sustainable toilet paper and clothing swaps, and lend advice to a teacher who feels unappreciated.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Buffy - Get $20 off Buffy bedding when you go to buffy.co and enter promo code F35.
  • Joybird - Visit joybird.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order with promo code FOREVER35.
  • Honeybook - Go to tryhoneybook.com/forever35 for 50% off your first year
  • Native - For 20% off your first purchase just visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FOREVER35 at checkout!
  • ThirdLove - Go to thirdlove.com/forever to get 15% off your first purchase.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
